page.title: 17UNUSUAL THEATRE SCARBOROUGH
page.content: Alan Ayckbourn provides 50% of the new plays performed there.The Theatre in the Round has very modern sound and lighting systems which includes a Gemini Rank Strand computerised lighting system.For each play, they have three weeks to rehearse and in that time all the props have to be made.The Theatre in the Round has a unique shape with the audience seated on all four sides of the actors.The Theatre in the Round is not only a theatre but has many people working there in a complex of the following rooms;there are 13 different offices, also front of house dressing room,two backstage dressing rooms,green room, rehearsal room,prop room,workshop, wardrobe,wardrobe store,two toilets front and backstage,piano store, kitchen,studio and theatre,store room, laundry and control box.
